title: Polenta with Kale and Goat Cheese
ingredients: ['15g butter', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 litre water', '120g coarse polenta or cornmeal', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '200g sweetcorn kernels', 'freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1/2 bunch kale', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tomato, sliced', '75g goat cheese']
